Docs.summary: Indicates that a native enumeration is not qualified by the enumeration type name. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The C++ compiler applies the ScopelessEnumAttribute attribute to native enumeration types to indicate that they do not need to be qualified by the enumeration type name when referenced in C++ programs. This attribute distinguishes native enumeration types from managed enumeration types.
